questions.title: The Peekapak Pals live in Peekaville.
questions.description: Peekaville is a small town nestled within lovely forests where humans and animals live and play in harmony.

questions.title: The Peekapak Pals go on adventures together.
questions.description: They even got to meet their favorite singers, Katy Bearry & Justin Beaver!

questions.title: Recently, a virus came to Peekaville.
questions.description: It's called the Peekaflu and it's getting many sick. We now have new rules to help keep us safe.

questions.title: Cody is still upset about the Berryball finals.
questions.description: He calls Kenji on his Peekapad for advice. Please take some time to read their conversation.

questions.title: Cody is still upset about the Berryball finals.
questions.description: Read the second page of Cody and Kenji's conversation here.

questions.question: What are two reasons why Kenji does not want Cody to play Berryball?

choices.answer: He doesn't like secrets.
He wants to protect other people in his community, like his grandma.
You can have Peekaflu and not show any symptoms.
He doesn't like Berryball.

questions.question: The best way for Cody to help Kenji's grandma is to make Saffron's butterberry soup in her home.

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: Social distancing means to stay at home and keep your distance from others.

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: How does Kenji use dominoes to explain the Peekaflu? Choose ONE answer.

choices.answer: If we play dominoes with others, we could get the Peekaflu.
If we stay separate, like spaced out dominoes, the Peekaflu won't spread.
If we get hit with something, like a domino, we could get Peekaflu.
Peekaflu is a game.

questions.question: What does Cody mean when he says, "It's about we, not me"? Choose ONE answer.

choices.answer: He likes group work more than independent work.
Considering other's needs before our own.
Staying with our friends will be helpful.

questions.question: What are TWO things Saffron wants to do?

choices.answer: She doesn't want to waste good ice cream.
She wants to give her famous ice-cream to the older people and animals.
She wants to invite her friends to the Ice Cream Parlor in Peekaville.
She wants to deliver ice cream to her friends.

questions.question: What are TWO things Saffron can do instead?

choices.answer: Tell her friends to stay at home.
Invite her friends over after the Peekaflu.
Tell her friends they can come over.
Go to her friends instead to give them the ice cream.

questions.question: What is one thing you would do if you were Saffron?

choices.answer: Tell my friends they can come over.
Tell my friends to stay at home.
Invite my friends over if they have masks.
Invite my friends over if they promise they're not sick.

questions.question: What are three things that could happen if Menka keeps building the slide?

choices.answer: Her friends might get sick with Peekaflu.
Her friends will be happy she made a safe choice.
Her friends might spread Peekaflu to other people in Peekaville.
The park might shut down.

questions.question: What is ONE thing Menka can do instead of building the slide?

choices.answer: Visit her friends.
Play at another playground.
Start a building project at home.

questions.question: When we're sick, what are two things we should NOT do?

choices.answer: Stay home and rest.
Go out to public places or events.
Go see our friends.
Wash our hands frequently for at least 20 seconds.

questions.question: What is ONE thing that may happen if Brady holds the auditions in the forest?

choices.answer: Those who attend the audition may get sick.
No one will get sick because the audition is outside.
Those who attend may get too hot because it's summer.
The people and animals auditioning will sound better outdoors.

questions.question: What can Brady can do instead? Choose all that apply.

choices.answer: Postpone the audition.
Hold the live audition virtually.
Hold the audition in the school.
Ask the animals and people auditioning to send a recorded performance.

questions.title: Cody thanks you for your thoughts!
questions.description: Feel free to write to Cody and tag us @Peekapak on Twitter and you may get a response from him!
